loading.message1: Remember, as you level up, your damage, spell damage, mana, and mana regeneration also increase, making it easier for you to defeat bosses. To level up, you can play timer, challenger, and boss modes.
loading.message2: Your data is saved on your device, don't forget to synchronize it from the profile menu to avoid losing your data.
loading.message3: Mistakes Happen, We're Here! If you've encountered an error or have suggestions to make our app better, please let us know. We can't improve without your feedback! We're Waiting for Your Feedback! Thank you.
loading.message4: Notice Anything Odd in Translations? While adapting our app to different languages, translation errors can sometimes occur. If you spot any mistake or come across terms that need correction, please don't hesitate to let us know.

commonGeneral.bestScoreByKill: Your best score by kill time

snackbarMessages.fillFields: Please fill out all required fields
snackbarMessages.errorConnection: Check your internet connection and try again.
snackbarMessages.errorSubmitScore1: You must be logged in to submit your score.
snackbarMessages.errorSubmitScore2: To submit your score, you need to beat your previous score.
snackbarMessages.succesSubmitScore: Your score has been sent successfully.
snackbarMessages.feedbackInfoMessage: Your message must be at least 10 characters.
snackbarMessages.feedbackSuccessMessage: Thank you! your feedback will help me improve your experience.
snackbarMessages.qwerHudInfoMessage1: Adjusts the height of the quas, wex, exort, and invoke buttons.
snackbarMessages.qwerHudInfoMessage2: The higher it is, the closer it is to the bottom.
snackbarMessages.syncDataSuccess: Your data has been successfully saved.
snackbarMessages.syncDataWait: You can perform synchronization every 5 minutes.
snackbarMessages.sbWaitAnimation: Button is inactive, it will be enabled in 5 seconds. Please wait.
snackbarMessages.sbResetPw: A password reset request has been sent to your email. Please check your email.

authErrorMessages.AuthWeakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
authErrorMessages.AuthEmailAlreadyInUse: The email address is already in use by another account.
authErrorMessages.AuthToManyRequests: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.

feedback.fbMidText: Tell me how your experience was and let me know what I can improve.
feedback.fbHint: Drop me any suggestions, questions or complaints to improve :)

bossBattleInfo.note: Note: Each level increases the spell damage by 2%.
bossBattleInfo.outerCircleInfo: The outer circle represents the boss's health.
bossBattleInfo.middleCircleInfo: The middle circle represents the number of rounds.
bossBattleInfo.innerCircleInfo: The inner circle represents the passage of time.
